verses.text: Now Aggeus \w the|strong="H5922"\w* prophet, \w and|strong="H3061"\w* Zacharias \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Addo, \w prophesied|strong="H5013"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* Judea \w and|strong="H3061"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* rose up Zorobabel \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Salathiel, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* Josue \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w son|strong="H1247"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Josedec, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w began|strong="H8271"\w* \w to|strong="H5974"\w* build \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* them \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5029"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* helping them.

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* at \w the|strong="H5675"\w* same \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w* Thathanai, \w who|strong="H4479"\w* \w was|strong="H2942"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* Stharbuzanai, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* their counsellors: \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4479"\w* hath \w given|strong="H0560"\w* \w you|strong="H5922"\w* \w counsel|strong="H2942"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* build \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* repair \w the|strong="H5675"\w* walls thereof?

\w In|strong="H1768"\w* answer \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H0116"\w* \w gave|strong="H0560"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w names|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H1124"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1400"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* promoters \w of|strong="H1124"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* eye \w of|strong="H0426"\w* their \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* upon \w the|strong="H0116"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*, \w and|strong="H3062"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* could \w not|strong="H3809"\w* hinder \w them|strong="H1994"\w*. \w And|strong="H3062"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* agreed \w that|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* matter should \w be|strong="H0426"\w* referred \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, \w and|strong="H3062"\w* \w then|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* should \w give|strong="H8421"\w* satisfaction \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w that|strong="H0116"\w* accusation.

\w The|strong="H5675"\w* \w copy|strong="H6573"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w letter|strong="H0104"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* Thathanai \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* country \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Stharbuzanai, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* counsellors \w the|strong="H5675"\w* Arphasachites, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* dwelt \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* letter which they \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* him, \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w written|strong="H3790"\w* \w thus|strong="H1836"\w*: \w To|strong="H5922"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w peace|strong="H8001"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H0426"\w* it \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* \w went|strong="H0236"\w* \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w province|strong="H4083"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Judea, \w to|strong="H3046"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w with|strong="H1124"\w* unpolished \w stones|strong="H0069"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w timber|strong="H0636"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w laid|strong="H7761"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w walls|strong="H3797"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w work|strong="H5673"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w carried|strong="H5648"\w* on \w diligently|strong="H0629"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* advanceth \w in|strong="H0426"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3028"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* \w we|strong="H0116"\w* \w asked|strong="H7593"\w* \w those|strong="H0479"\w* ancients, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H1836"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4479"\w* hath \w given|strong="H0560"\w* you authority \w to|strong="H0560"\w* build \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* repair \w these|strong="H0479"\w* walls?

\w We|strong="H1768"\w* \w asked|strong="H7593"\w* \w also|strong="H0638"\w* \w of|strong="H7217"\w* them their \w names|strong="H8036"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* might give thee notice: \w and|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* have \w written|strong="H3790"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w names|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H7217"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* chief among them.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H3660"\w* answered \w us|strong="H5649"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* words, \w saying|strong="H0560"\w*: \w We|strong="H0586"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w we|strong="H0586"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w* \w a|strong="H1934"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* \w many|strong="H7690"\w* \w years|strong="H8140"\w* \w ago|strong="H6928"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H1934"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* set up.

\w But|strong="H3861"\w* \w after|strong="H4481"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* our \w fathers|strong="H0002"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w provoked|strong="H7265"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w to|strong="H4481"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7265"\w*, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* delivered \w them|strong="H1994"\w* into \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w hands|strong="H3028"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* Nabuchodonosor \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* Chaldean: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* destroyed \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* carried away \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w to|strong="H4481"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1297"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w set|strong="H7761"\w* forth \w a|strong="H7761"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w should|strong="H4430"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w also|strong="H0638"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* Nabuchodonosor \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w taken|strong="H5312"\w* out \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w brought|strong="H2987"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w to|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w brought|strong="H2987"\w* out \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* delivered \w to|strong="H4481"\w* one Sassabasar, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w also|strong="H0638"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w appointed|strong="H7761"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1005"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* him: \w Take|strong="H5376"\w* \w these|strong="H0412"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w go|strong="H0236"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w put|strong="H5182"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* let \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* its \w place|strong="H0870"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* same Sassabasar, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w laid|strong="H3052"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w foundations|strong="H0787"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w temple|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w time|strong="H0116"\w* \w until|strong="H5705"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* it \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* yet finished.

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* therefore \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w* seem good \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w* \w search|strong="H1240"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingâ€™s|strong="H4430"\w* library, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w whether|strong="H2006"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w* hath been decreed \w by|strong="H7761"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w should|strong="H4430"\w* \w be|strong="H0426"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w let|strong="H3705"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w send|strong="H7972"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* pleasure \w to|strong="H5922"\w* us \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* matter.
